link.description: Here you can find a bunch of example HOCs. They're pretty much production ready. Some of them adds magic props with an "_" prefix. It'd be good to add the ability to set your own prefix, e.g. x-if, x-loader, x-tooltip etc., but for the sad reason that there's no way to make the typing work with parameterized prefixes, we encourage you to copy the source and change it to your likings.
